programme.title: Thirtieth anniversary of Kennedy assassination, 1993
programme.short_synopsis: The 30th anniversary of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy.
programme.medium_synopsis: Searching for a fair evaluation of John F Kennedy's life, 30 years after his assasination and how the significance of anniversaries is transformed by historical revisions.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
